price: Hao wana vyeo mbali mbali kwa Mwenyezi Mungu. Na Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye kuyaona yote wayatendayo.
arabic: هُمۡ دَرَجَٰتٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Makundi mawili hayo hayawi sawa, bali yametafautiana mbele ya Mwenyezi Mungu kwa daraja mbali mbali. Na Mwenyezi Mungu anazijua vyema hali zao na daraja zao, na atawalipa kwa mujibu wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: hum darajātun ʿinda al-lahi wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā yaʿmalūna
